scripts.init:server: mkdir -p server && cd server && ../composer.phar require slim/slim slim/psr7 php-di/slim-bridge middlewares/trailing-slash slim/twig-view zguillez/z-database && ../composer.phar install
scripts.init:z: npm run update && cd _ && cp vite.config.js ../client && cp -R config.ini index.php services templates ../server && cp htaccess.txt ../server/.htaccess
scripts.serve: npm run build && cd dist && php -S localhost:8080
scripts.update:client: cd client && npm-check-updates -u && sort-package-json && npm i && cd ../
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && rm -rf ../dist/index.html
scripts.build:server: cd server && cp -R .htaccess config.ini index.php services templates vendor ../dist
